Name: Adventures of Sadukar - Chapter I
About the game: Adventures of Sadukar is a turn based RPG that follows Sadukar and his friends through an open world plagued with monsters. Sadukar and his group of hero's journey throughout the lands running into random encounters and challenges everywhere they go. You will explore maze like castle's, caves, and dungeons as you level up and unlock new skills and abilities to use in a classic side view turn based combat system.
